Title: Introduction to Power Systems
Content: This course provides an overview of power systems.

Title: Power System Protection
Content: This course covers power system protection principles.

Title: Advanced Power System Analysis
Content: This course focuses on advanced power system analysis techniques.

Title: Electricity Market Fundamentals
Content: This course introduces electricity market fundamentals.

Title: Renewable Energy Integration
Content: This course explores the integration of renewable energy sources into the power grid.
